name: Firing Line 2: the game
description:
"Ohana means family. Family means no one gets left behind." - Firing Line 2

You read that right. The OFFICIAL game of the FIRING LINE 2 podcast. All your favorites hosts are here: Brad, Beatbox, Sam and Joe Sweden. You CAN win in this 3D Open World RPG with over 20 unique endings.

Listen to the latest Firing Line 2 episode here.
